Showers early then partly cloudy overnight PERIOD Low around 50F PERIOD Winds S at  to  mph PERIOD Chance of rain  PERIOD

Updated November     pm



Dr PERIOD H PERIOD Richard Winn chair of the Department of Neurological Surgery at Harborview Medical Center pled guilty to obstructing justice a felony yesterday in a federal court PERIOD Winn was the focus of an investigation led by U.S PERIOD attorneys for committing fraud against such healthcare programs as Medicare and Medicaid PERIOD

Winns guilty plea was part of a settlement plan between him and the U.S PERIOD Attorneys Office PERIOD He will not serve time in prison PERIOD For his guilty plea Winn will pay  to three healthcare programs and complete  hours of community service in the form of health care for the poor PERIOD

Winn has also agreed to resign from the University PERIOD

 said Dr PERIOD Paul G PERIOD Ramsey vice president for medical affairs and dean of the School of Medicine in a written statement PERIOD 

Winn will cease his practice at both Harborview and UW Medical Centers UWMC once he resigns PERIOD However Winn should be able to retain his license as a doctor PERIOD

 said Cyrus R PERIOD Vance Jr. Winns attorney PERIOD According to Vance Winn has worked for the UW for  years PERIOD

Earlier this month Winn was selected as one of the best neurosurgeons in Western Washington by The Best Doctors in America PERIOD

While the federal governments investigation into Winns billing practices at the UWMC appears to have concluded Ramsey thinks otherwise PERIOD

 Ramsey said in a written statement PERIOD 

The investigation involves allegations that physicians at the UWMC billed for services when they were not present or charged for more expensive procedures PERIOD

In his appearance in court Winn said he asked other doctors to not provide

lawenforcement officers and a federal grand jury evidence that would incriminate him PERIOD Winn added he went as far as to ask doctors and staff to provide false information to the investigation PERIOD Winn said he threatened the job security of members of the UWMC neurosurgery department if they didnt protect him PERIOD

Winn resigned from chairing the medical schools neurosurgery department in February PERIOD

A sentencing hearing has been scheduled for Oct PERIOD  PERIOD If the terms of Winns plea agreement are not carried out at that hearing Winn could change his plea to not guilty PERIOD

UWMC was ranked the eleventh best hospital in the country Friday according to U.S PERIOD News  World Reports  guide to  UWMC tied with New York Presbyterian Hospital and is the only hospital west of Rochester Minn. and north of San Francisco to earn such an honor PERIOD

 said Dr PERIOD Eric Larson UWMC medical director PERIOD
